body.section: Hierarchy SocialHistoryConcern is a kind of HealthConcern

ul.li: SubstanceUse is a kind of SocialHistoryConcern

section.title: Description
section.p: Subjective information that addresses occupational and recreational aspects of the patient's personal life that have the potential to be clinically significant such as sexual history, smoking history and alcohol consumption.

stentry.p: Identifies the Social History Health Concern or Problem being described. This property is re-defined to "bind" to the SocialHistoryType valueset rather than the generic Problem valueset to which the supertype health concern property is bound.
